episodes.title: Inside the Cult: Secrets They Don’t Want You to Know - Full Documentary
episodes.description:
⚠️🙏 Shocking secrets. Hidden abuses. A rare look inside a cult accused of control and silence.🔍

This shocking investigation takes you inside a religious cult accused of sectarian practices and abuses. From mandatory evangelism and strict community immersion to the shunning of former members, the cult enforces absolute control over its followers.

Former members and investigators expose the most disturbing allegations, including child abuse reporting policies that allow predators to go unpunished.

Through rare testimonies and investigative reporting, this documentary reveals the cult’s hidden world of silence, control, and fear.

🔔 Subscribe now and hit the notification bell to embark on a journey of knowledge and discovery with us. Join our community of curious minds and make learning an exciting adventure. 🔔
